home.title: Get your driver’s license with confidence at Moen
home.description: Professional, stress-free automatic driving lessons in Dutch and English. Personal guidance, a high pass rate, and a fast track to your driver’s license.
home.where: Professional automatic driving lessons in Hoofddorp, Haarlem, Heemstede, Nieuw-Vennep and the surrounding region.
home.car_gear: Drive calmly and safely without worrying about gear shifting. Ideal for beginners, nervous drivers, or anyone who wants fast results.
home.route_exam: We are familiar with all CBR exam routes in Haarlem and practise them regularly during lessons.
home.lang_spec: Take your driving lessons in the language you feel most comfortable with.
home.time_agenda: Driving lessons that fit your schedule – evenings and weekends available.
home.props_text: 90% of electric and modern hybrid cars are automatic. Start your driving journey with the technology of tomorrow.
home.attention_text: If you take your driving test in a vehicle with automatic transmission, you will receive an automatic driving licence.
home.attention_additions: This is indicated by code 78 on the driving licence.

lesson.title: Choose Your Driving Course
lesson.subtitle: Choose the lesson package that fits your goals.
lesson.cancelpolicy_text: You can cancel or reschedule driving lessons free of charge up to 24 hours before the scheduled start time. If a lesson is cancelled within 24 hours of the start time, or if you do not show up without prior notice, we unfortunately have to charge the full lesson fee.

intro.title: Introductory lesson
intro.facility: Driving lesson in a modern automatic car
intro.assesment: Personal intake and driving skill assessment
intro.pickup: Pickup and drop-off at your location
